import React from 'react' import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import getproductsCB from '../../api/api' const ProdScreen = (props) => { console.log(props) console.log(props.match.params.id) const [state, setstate] = React.useState([]) let table = [] const ActiveFunction = async () => { const result = await getproductsCB(); const CB = JSON.parse(result) setstate(CB.Table) console.log(table) return [table] } React.useEffect(() => { ActiveFunction() }, []) const product = state.find((x) => x._id === state.match.params.id); console.log(state) return (
{/*
Back to result
  • {state.name} Price: {product.price}
  • Description:
    {state.description}
  • Qty: {state.prix}
*/}
); } export default ProdScreen
